briefTitle: The Development of a Personalized Decision Aid: Perspectives of Patients and Health Care Professionals on Shared Decision Making and Informational Needs on Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Development of a Personalized Decision Aid: Perspectives of Patients and Health Care Professionals on Shared Decision Making and Informational Needs on Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Patients' perspectives on informational needs and shared decision making when making a decision on radiation treatment, a qualitative assessment.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 2-3 months after facing decision or \> 1 year after decision
* able to speak and understand Dutch
* Written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* recurrence of breast cancer prior to interview
